title: L&T Finance partners with Cred to offer fast, unsecured personal loans
description: L&T Finance has teamed up with Cred to provide unsecured personal loans to high-credit-score members of the platform. These loans, facilitated in collaboration with digital lender Newtap Finance, will offer quick approval, flexible repayment terms, and competitive interest rates.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
